Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Houston in 1971...
Injured on 5/13/1976 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1978, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1978, off Dave Lemanczyk (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1978, hitting .474 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1978, hitting .336 with 13 HR, 83 RBI...
Injured on 6/12/1979 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
